article_title: New app will help Horizon doctors combat COVID-19
article_description: New Brunswick doctors in the Horizon Health Network will soon have a new app to help them combat the COVID 19 outbreak  says an infectious diseases specialist
article_content: New Brunswick doctors in the Horizon Health Network will soon have a new app to help them combat the COVID 19 outbreak  says an infectious diseases specialist The Spectrum app will provide clear guidelines on what tests to do  what infection control to carr   2935 chars
